title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)
descriptions:
Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack – Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra

- Fabric: Stretchy 90% nylon/10% spandex for everyday comfort.
- Coverage: Soft-lined, full-coverage cups designed for secure support on larger busts.
- Support: Wide shaping band and multi-row hook-and-eye closure for stay-put, wirefree hold.
- Straps: Soft, wide, front-adjustable straps for easy, personalized fit.
- Pack: Value pack of 1 includes one satin bra.
- Styles & Sizes: Leopard print plus core colors like white and nude; sizes 32C–50DD.

A smooth, supportive, wirefree essential with front-adjustable convenience and satin style.

Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

Title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)

Description: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra, (Sizes from 32C to 50DD)

QUALITY FABRIC – The best wireless bra for large busts, this style is made from stretchy 90% nylon/10% spandex for all-around comfort.

VALUE YOU EXPECT – Each everyday women's bra pack of 1 comes with one satin bra.

FULL-COVERAGE FIT – Our soft lining is great for large busts since it provides allover coverage for that secure fit you love.

SUPPORT YOU NEED – A wide band helps shape and hold you in place for everyday wireless support that lasts. Rows of hook-and-eye closures keep you secure.

FRONT-ADJUSTABLE STRAPS – Soft, wide straps can be adjusted in the front, so no need to strain in order to find the perfect fit.

COLORS & SIZE OPTIONS – From black bras with a leopard print and other colors like white, nude, and beyond, to sizes 32C to plus sizes 50DD, we have options for everyone.
